Sentencas: Achieving high densification at low sintering temperatures for lanthanum silicate apatites is a major technological hurdle to enable this class of materials to be evaluated as electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using sol-gel process, materials close to 97% of theoretical density have been obtained at a low sintering temperature of 1773 K for both doped and undoped samples.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of varying concentrations of Zn2+ doping on the sinterability, electrical, thermal and microstructural properties of 0.2 mol Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 were investigated.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ionic conductivity of the samples was measured using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy in the temperature range of 573 K-1073 K.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A total ionic conductivity of 1.7 x 10(-2) Scm(-1) with a corresponding activation energy of 0.33 eV at 1073 K were measured for the composition La10Zn0.2(SiO4)(5.8)O-2.5 which is higher than 9 x 10(-3) Scm(-1) for the undoped composition La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composition La(10)oMg(0.2)Zn(0.4)(SiO4)(5.4)O-4.8 has the lowest thermal expansion coefficient of 8.470 x 10(-6) K-1 of all the samples investigated.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis and characterization of Zn2+ and Mg2+ doped La10Si6O27 electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells
